definition: the act of reducing the selling price of merchandise, bar from attention or consideration
details:
noun
- the act of reducing the selling price of merchandise
= synonyms: price reduction, deduction
- an amount or percentage deducted
= synonyms: deduction
- a refund of some fraction of the amount paid
= synonyms: rebate
- interest on an annual basis deducted in advance on a loan
= synonyms: discount rate, bank discount
verb
- bar from attention or consideration
= synonyms: disregard, dismiss, ignore, brush aside, brush off, push aside
- give a reduction in price on
= example: give a reduction in price on
